channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Quantum Is ‘Decades Away’? Not So Fast.
item.description: Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang claims quantum computing is decades away, but is it really? Discover how quantum is already transforming industries.

item.title: The problem with marketing puffery

item.title: Hacked Gmail Account Recovery Not Possible—What You Need To Do
item.description: Some Gmail users are finding themselves unable to recover their accounts—here’s what you need to do to ensure you can.

item.title: The value of artifacts
item.description: An artifact is an object that holds or signifies an idea. A book on paper is an artifact: it’s the object plus the words. Now that you can get the wor...

item.title: The ‘Creature Commandos’ Finale Brings Back Another DCEU Cast Member
item.description: Creature Commandos, the first official DCU project, has ended its first season, and with the finale, added another DCEU character to its roster.

item.title: Working with problems

item.title: Situational spending

item.title: London’s Friday Fare Drop Didn’t Tempt Home Workers—TfL Should Keep It Anyway
item.description: Transport for London (TfL) can exclusively reveal that £1.40 isn't enough to get Londoners out of their flats and into offices on a Friday.

item.title: Busy-ness and leverage
